Detailed Description

A COLLADA emitter instance.

The types of particles emitted are instance dependent. Instances also contain the FCDForceInstances pointers to forces applied to the particles.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FCDEmitterInstance::FCDEmitterInstance (  FCDocument *  document,
FCDSceneNode *  parent,
FCDEntity::Type  entityType = FCDEntity::EMITTER
)  [protected]
 

Constructor: do not use directly.

Instead, use the FCDSceneNode::AddInstance function.

Parameters:
document The COLLADA document that owns the emitter instance.
parent The parent visual scene node.
entityType The type of the entity to instantiate. Unless this class is overwritten, FCDEntity::EMITTER should be given.
